title: The Beverly hillbillies. Volume 1.
brief_description: The Clampett’s strike oil. Premiere episode of the series, screened in 1962. Relive the Clampett adventures leading up to Jed becoming a rich man. “Getting settled”. The Clampetts learn to adjust to their new Beverly Hills digs with their critters in tow and fun times ahead.
